subject: Attention Customer
body:
Attention Customer
This is from Coca cola Company contacting again regarding for this your US$10.500,000.00 for last time, we told you before that our coca cola  company Branch in your Country will contact you US$10.500,000.00 after your file is approved with the low cost of $25 which you have opportunity from now till tomorrow After tomorrow, this payment will cancel and nullify, 
if you are willing to receive this US$10.500,000.00   awarded by Coca Cola Company then send
Apple gift card or Steam Card of $25 and update us.
Mr Stephen James
President & Chief Operating
Officer of Coca-Cola Canada Bottling Limited

subject: Re: Attention Customer
body:
Hello Mr. Stephen James,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the US award from Coca Cola Company. I appreciate the reminder about the deadline for payment. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

Could you please provide more details about the award? What is it specifically for and how was I selected as a recipient? Additionally, could you clarify why an Apple gift card or Steam Card is required for this process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Gary
